se.cbb.jprime.topology

Class NeighbourJoiningTreeGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.topology.NeighbourJoiningTreeGenerator

  • public class NeighbourJoiningTreeGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Tree generator which computes an (arbitrarily rooted) bifurcating Neighbour Joining (NJ) tree based on sequence identity (not more fancy sequence evolution than that!).

    Note: Heavy code reusage not using generics; just couldn't cope with sorting out the type mess... TODO: This class should be improved when BioJava is more stable.

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

      • createNewickTreeString

        public static <S extends org.biojava3.core.sequence.template.AbstractSequence<C>,C extends org.biojava3.core.sequence.template.Compound> java.lang.String createNewickTreeString(java.util.List<S> unalignedSeqs)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a NJ Newick tree on string format (with some sort of lengths) using a list of unaligned sequences. Based on sequence identity only. Sequences will be aligned with CLUSTALW first.
        Type Parameters:
        S - sequence type.
        C - compound type.
        Parameters:
        unalignedSeqs - unaligned sequences.
        Returns:
        an inferred Newick tree with lengths.
        Throws:
        Exception.
        java.lang.Exception
